body.p: The list of document templates that are displayed in the New dialog the New dialog can be extended with custom templates that are specified in the Document Templates preferences panel. Add the template files in a folder that is specified in this panel or in the templates folder of the install directory.
To open the Document Templates preferences page, go to Options Window Preferences oXygen XML Editor Author Editor Templates Document Templates .

You can add new document template location folders and manage existing ones. You can also alter the order in which looks into these location folders by using the Up and Down buttons on a selected table row.
